metadata.title: USN-6711-1 -- CRM shell vulnerability
metadata.description: Vincent Berg discovered that CRM shell incorrectly handled certain commands. An local attacker could possibly use this issue to execute arbitrary code via shell code injection to the crm history commandline.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6711-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  crmsh - 4.2.0-2ubuntu1.1 crmsh-doc - 4.2.0-2ubuntu1.1 No subscription required
